attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in this government to protect the welfare of animals
attributes.additional_details:
Any government that allows the slaughter of animals for food without humane slaughtering doesn't deserve my vote.
Any government that believes religious beliefs and faith take precedence over an animals pain and suffering doesn't deserve my vote.
Any government that won't advise the population of what they are eating and how it has been killed doesn't deserve my vote.
I will at the next general election get this government removed by voting against it, as it does not represent the majority of its people.
